items.name: Good Retrieval Augmented Generation (GRAG)
items.description: A simple open-source python package that provides an easy end-to-end solution for implementing Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

items.name: Pangea Multilingual Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM)
items.description: Carnegie Mellon University's School of Computer Science developed Pangea. The open-source, multilingual multimodal large language model (MLLM) recognizes 39 languages and was trained on six million data samples to create a culturally inclusive model.
